Body:
X = np.ones(7)
y1 = ['1'] * 4 + ['0'] * 3
y2 = np.hstack((np.ones(4), np.zeros(3)))
y3 = y2.tolist()
for shuffle in (None, 'simple', 'stratified', 'group'):
    X_train1, X_test1, y_train1, y_test1 = train_test_split(X, y1,
        random_state=0, labels=y1 if shuffle in ('stratified', 'group') else
        None)
    X_train2, X_test2, y_train2, y_test2 = train_test_split(X, y2,
        random_state=0, labels=y2 if shuffle in ('stratified', 'group') else
        None)
    X_train3, X_test3, y_train3, y_test3 = train_test_split(X, y3,
        random_state=0, labels=y3 if shuffle in ('stratified', 'group') else
        None)
    np.testing.assert_equal(X_train1, X_train2)
    np.testing.assert_equal(y_train2, y_train3)
    np.testing.assert_equal(X_test1, X_test3)
    np.testing.assert_equal(y_test3, y_test2)
